01_data_basics/01_counting/07_read_histogram_discrete_v2

A standard ten-sided die was rolled 70 times, and the results were organized into the histogram shown below.



  1. Evaluate \(\#[\mathbf{x}<9.5]\).
  2. Evaluate \(\#[\mathbf{x}>7.5]\).
  3. Evaluate \(\#[|\mathbf{x}-4.5|<1]\).
  4. Evaluate \(\#[|\mathbf{x}-8.5|>1]\).
  5. Evaluate half-integer boundary \(b\) such that \(\#[\mathbf{x}<b] = 25\).
  6. Evaluate half-integer boundary \(b\) such that \(\#[\mathbf{x}>b] = 22\).
  7. Evaluate integer radius \(r\) such that \(\#[|\mathbf{x}-4.5|<r] = 10\).
  8. Evaluate half-integer radius \(r\) such that \(\#[|\mathbf{x}-3|>r] = 49\).
